name: Moana
description: A young chieftain who navigates by stars and tides, the ocean itself responding to her call.

dialogue.greeting: Isaac! The ocean chose you, too. Are you ready to learn the language of waves and currents?

about_ocean.initial: The ocean's alive, sharing its thoughts with anyone who listens.
about_ocean.wayfinding: Our ancestors crossed seas by reading stars and currents. I'll show you how.
about_ocean.connection: Sometimes the water dances just because it can. Listen for its laughter!

about_items.heart_of_te_fiti: This heart pulses with life, a reminder that nature itself is alive and aware.
about_items.wayfinder_pendant: This pendant helps read the stars and waves. Every current carries a story, every star lights a path.

about_journey.reflection: Finding your way is as much about who you are as where you're going.
about_journey.mastery: Water has its own rhythm. Once you hear it, you're never lost.
about_journey.wisdom: The ocean connects all people. Sometimes going far helps us see what's always been near.
